data.title: Scholarships Search
data.text:
A UT College of Communication & Information Award

The funds will be used for scholarship support, including but not limited to study abroad:

1. Undergraduate or graduate student(s) in the School of Journalism & Electronic Media who study the field of international journalism

John P. Hart Scholarship in Broadcasting. Applicants are considered based on major and academic achievement. Some consideration given to need.

The funds will be used for:

1. Undergraduate student majoring in broadcasting at UTK

2. Selection will be based primarily on academic achievement (3.0 GPA or higher), with some consideration given to financial need.
